title: 掉线提示
author: jin7568866
txt_content:
User RocZheng has disconnected, reason: Internal Exception: java.io.IOException: Connection reset by peer


什么原因？怎么解决？

replies.author: yuudachi
replies.txt_content: Connection reset by peer这一句大概是因为服务器超负荷了= -=然后自动关闭了一些连接

replies.author: jin7568866
replies.txt_content: User RocZheng has disconnected, reason: Internal Exception: java.io.IOException: Connection reset by peer复制代码

replies.author: MRTangwin8
replies.txt_content:
尝试关闭一些拉网速的程序
网络原因所致

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: Connection reset by peer 是玩家连接服务器的频率超过服务器的负荷
